alert.note: Alert for Lower North Platte River Basin, Scottsbluff National Monument (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 14 at 2:20PM CDT until October 14 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS CONTINUE THIS AFTERNOON... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 433 AND 436... The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect until 7 PM MDT this evening. * WIND...Northwest 20 to 30 MPH with gusts up to 45 MPH. * HUMIDITY...Minimum 10 to 15 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Lower North Platte River Basin, Scottsbluff National Monument
